subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With top-seeded U.C.L.A. facing third-seeded Xavier in the West Region final for a trip to the Final Four, Tony Salesi, the trainer for the Pittsburgh program for the last 22 seasons, is torn.
snippet: With top-seeded U.C.L.A. facing third-seeded Xavier in the West Region final for a trip to the Final Four, Tony Salesi, the trainer for the Pittsburgh program for the last 22 seasons, is torn.
